title: Did Charles Krauthammer Write an Op-Ed Called ‘The Enemy Among Us?’
subtitle: The Washington Post columnist did not write an article alleging that former President Barack Obama was creating a "shadow government" through his nonprofit Organizing for Action.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Columnist Charles Krauthammer wrote an opinion piece entitled "The Enemy Among Us" alleging that former President Barack Obama was creating a "shadow government" through his nonprofit Organizing for Action.
